# update

**Instance Method**

Manually triggers the update process.

## Declaration

```swift
void update();
```

## Updating the Cache

- **add**: Forthcoming
- **swapCache**: Replaces the active cache with the latest version.

items.description: Replaces the active cache with the latest version.
